title: ‘Peter Pan’s Neverland Nightmare’ First Look Revealed
description:

title: Netflix Cancels Fan-Favorite Series After 2 Seasons
description:
Netflix hasn’t held back when it comes to canceling their shows. The streaming service has become more adamant about curating their library in recent years, and if for one reason a series doesn’t perform as they see fit, Netflix has no issue with canning it.
